By Dark Phoenix on Saturday, March 10, 2001 - 02:12 am:

Those little items your monsters ask for usually have either a very minor effect on stress, or a vary minor effect on form. I have a list somewhere on this board that lists all those little items. As a general rule of thumb, if it's edible it increases form by 1, if it's not, reduce stress by 1. Note, refusing a monsters request can increase stress by as little as +1 to as much as +10 or more, depending on how spoiled the monster is.

As for the second part of your question, the answer is yes.

By Varthlokkur on Monday, March 12, 2001 - 06:39 am:

So, basically, the items your monsters ask for have their normal effect (ie: Dummy -1 stress, Olive Oil -1 stress +1 form).

Refusing is a +1 to +10 stress hit. That will be another toughie to factor in.
